original: intros m z i j Hinv Hexd Hnpred. intros zi zj m0 Hinterval. destruct (Nat.le_exists i j Hinterval) as [i' [Heqi Hj]]. rewrite Heqi in *. apply bottom_B0_bis with (j := j) in Hinv; try auto. rewrite <- Hinv. reflexivity. - apply Nat.lt_le_incl. auto.
